mapper.select: SELECT `id` ,`showId` ,`userId` ,`bookingNumber` ,`bookingDate` ,`showDate` ,`showTime` ,`seat` ,`seatPrice` ,`seatGrade` ,`isReserved` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `booking` WHERE `showId` = #{showId} AND `showDate` = #{selectedDate} AND `showTime` = #{selectedTime} AND `isReserved` = 1
